The more “senior” the specialist is the more opportunities for development he or she has.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Starting from the Senior level, you can participate in the Mentoring Program as a Mentor and contribute to your colleagues' professional development.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Test Automation Mentoring Program for E1 and Manual Testers to Develop Automated Testing as a Secondary Skill\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM provides opportunities to gain theoretical knowledge and practical experience in test automation for the engineers (E1 and T1 - T4). also includes some useful materials that can be used for self-study, grouped by technical stack.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In addition, each program begins with the selection of 70)\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Therefore, if you have some free time you are ready to spend on supervising and assisting your mentee and would like to dive into new challenges, you can easily join the program as a mentor.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Automation engineers may apply for the program not only as mentees or mentors. If you have good expertise in test automation and rather good public speaking and presentation skills, you can join the program as a lector.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Feel free to reach out to the Program\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The program helps E1 engineers get more practice and experience with project.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The participant will work on a real project with a team and will perform real project tasks under a mentor's supervision.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The main goal of this program for an engineer is to get knowledge and experience for E2 position quickly and with a full-time load.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"What are the requirements for are no special requirements for this program. Program is designed for E1+/E2 level specialists and some additional topics not included in the program of basic level as well as deeper learning of some topics from that program.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"More information can be found Program (Advanced Test Automation Mentoring Program)\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Advanced Automated Testing Mentoring Program is designed for E2 level specialists and covers a wide range of advanced test automation technical topics in fields of UI and API testing, working with Docker, cloud platforms, TAF creation from scratch and its integration with the most demanded testing tools.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Program participants will have the opportunity to choose the technology stack (Java/.NET/JS) and some specific tools to work with during the program run. That would help them to gain necessary experience and knowledge about a wider range of tools used for testing. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"More information\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://learn.epam.com/detailsPage?id=81849dca-1337-4d74-89fd-10b3850c7a5c\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"here\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"E3toE4 Program (Test Automation Expert Global Mentoring Program)\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This program has a goal to help Senior Test Automation Engineers to step into leadership. The program covers the most important topics that are needed to enhance process and communication skills. The program covers such areas as: leadership & management, process excellence, customer facing.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Target audience is E3+/T3+ engineers. The program has no technical tasks related to any tech stack, with this most exercises have a format of case study where participants should find a solution in a given context.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"More information can be found \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://learn.epam.com/detailsPage?id=369e836d-8776-4d4e-a396-46b476ae076b\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"here\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"CTOO Educational Programs\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM is a company that cares about the growth of each engineer. That's why we have such a great Educational Program as CTOO - Chief / Solution Architect in Test Automation. You can explore the continuous learning path consisting of programs and professional communities for Solution Architects and Developers/Managers who are interested in growing in Solution
